title: Governance System State Transition (SST) Proposal Schema
description: Defines the required input structure for the GSEP-C PRE (Ingress Validation) layer, enforced by the Governance Schema Contract (GSC). Standardizing this structure ensures proposal integrity prior to execution orchestration.

proposal_id.description: Unique cryptographic or sequential identifier for the proposal.

origin_context.description: Source context of the proposal creation, critical for L4 Provenance checks.

change_description.description: High-level summary and rationale for the intended structural change (SST).

target_state_hash.description: Cryptographic hash (SHA-384 or higher) of the proposed target system state configuration.

S01_claimed.description: Initial quantified claim of expected Efficacy Metric (S-01).

S02_estimated.description: Initial quantified estimation of systemic Risk Metric (S-02).

SCI_burden_estimate.description: Estimated impact on Structural Cost Index (C-01 Constraint) for L3 verification.

attestation_signature.description: Digital signature proving proposal provenance and non-tampering (verified by CTAL L4).
